mapper.select:
select ei.id, ei.order_id, ei.user_id, ei.merchant_id, ei.content, ei.score, ei.create_date, ei.images, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, oi.code as orderCode, oi.after_order_price, oi.order_price , oi.`type`, oi.integral, mi.name as merchantName from evaluate_info ei left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ei.user_id) left join order_info oi on (oi.id = ei.order_id) left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = ei.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.userName},'%')
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{evaluateInfo.userId}
AND mi.user_id = #{evaluateInfo.merchantId}
order by ei.create_date desc
